mapper.insert:
insert into sa_user( guid, userid, username, password, isactive, tel, fax, email, defaultgroupguid, defaultroleguid, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid, latestlogintime, country, state, city, zipcode, address, mobile, isshield, useridwx) values (#GUID#, #USERID#, #USERNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PASSWORD#,
#ISACTIVE#, 'Y',
#TEL:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FAX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #EMAIL:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DEFAULTGROUPGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DEFAULTROLEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #COUNTRY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #STATE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CITY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ZIPCODE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ADDRESS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MOBILE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISSHIELD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #USERIDWX#)
mapper.update:
update sa_user
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#,
userid = #USERID#,
username = #USERNAME#,
password = #PASSWORD#,
isactive = #ISACTIVE#,
tel = #TEL#,
fax = #FAX#,
email = #EMAIL#,
defaultgroupguid = #DEFAULTGROUPGUID#,
defaultroleguid = #DEFAULTROLEGUID#,
latestlogintime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
country = #COUNTRY#,
state = #STATE#,
city = #CITY#,
zipcode = #ZIPCODE#,
address = #ADDRESS#,
mobile = #MOBILE#,
isshield = #ISSHIELD#,
useridwx = #USERIDWX#,
where guid = #GUID#
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM sa_user a WHERE guid=#guid#
